content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to browse interesting websites and my computer returned a list of diverse websites to explore. The website recommended was beebom.com, which provides a collection of lists and comments on interesting and diverse websites to explore, ranging from music search engines to educational resources, with examples including Deepswap.ai, Gnoosic, and Nandgame. The author encourages readers to step outside of popular websites and discover new treasures on the internet. Commenters express appreciation for the variety and helpfulness of the website.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "interesting_websites.txt", "text": "Interesting websites found on Beebom:\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
